[B]Story[/B]
-=-=-=-=-=-=-

58 "Time Out for Vengeance!" Michael Goguen J. M. DeMatteis June 4, 2011 (iTunes) 306
 
Teaser: The Creeper cheers on and helps Batman when he's fighting Hellgrammite.

Main Plot: Batman and the Justice League International travel to the past to stop the minions of Equinox from wiping out all 
the incarnations of Batman throughout time. 
 
Spoken Language:- English

[b]Note:[/b] I'm using the US season and episode numbers to keep in line with the {C_P} releases 
which include 2 more episodes at the start of season 3 which are listed as part of season 2 on itunes & elsewhere
